Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-781.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell reserved phosphate interests of the United States in certain lands located in the State of Florida to the record owner or owners of such lands.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to sell reserved phosphate interests of the United States in specified lands located in the State of Florida to the record owner or owners of such lands.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell reserved phosphate interests of the United States in certain lands located in the State of Florida to the record owner or owners of such lands.
